features: Diamond-infused ceramic nonstick coating for effortless performance and extraordinary durability
The coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium
3-ply stainless steel body heats quickly, evenly and delivers incredible results
Matte stainless steel handle gives you safe and secure grip

body.description: Start crafting healthier, daily meals with this 8” frying pan featuring GreenPan’s healthy ceramic nonstick coating free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. Built for daily durability, this must-have frying pan is made with a tri-ply stainless steel body that heats quickly and evenly to deliver incredible results every single time. The trimmed edges help protect the coating and prevent future damage while the matte stainless steel handle gives you a safe and secure grip. Dishwasher safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GREENPAN CHATHAM STAINLESS STEEL CERAMIC NONSTICK COOKWARE

3-PLY STAINLESS STEEL CHATHAM The best GreenPan features in one flawless design. Chatham Stainless is crafted from tough 3-ply stainless steel for even heating and fantastic performance on all stovetops. This collection's metal utensil safe ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium. Scratch-resistant and durable, this collection has matte stainless steel handles for effortless transition from stovetop to oven. TOXIN-FREE: FREE OF PFAS & PFOA HEALTHY CERAMIC NONSTICK GreenPan's signature ceramic nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium so you can make any meal healthier. ALUMINUM CORE FOR FAST HEATING EXTRA SCRATCH-RESISTANT Chatham's 3-ply stainless steel bodies have an aluminum core surrounded by two stainless steel layers for extra scratch-resistant and ultra-fast heating. OVEN & BROILER SAFE MATTE STAINLESS STEEL HANDLE The riveted, ergonomic design of this durable handle gives you a secure and comfortable grip. Oven safe up to 600°F, glass lids up to 425°F. WIPE CLEAN WITH EASE EASY CLEANUP GreenPan's signature ceramic nonstick coating is easy to wipe clean ease, plus it's dishwasher safe for big messes.

Previous page STAINLESS STEEL 3-ply stainless steel is scratch-resistant and dishwasher safe CERAMIC NONSTICK Healthy ceramic nonstick coating is metal utensil safe and free of PFAS, PFOA, lead and cadmium. STAINLESS HANDLES Matte stainless steel handles are ergonomic and oven safe up to 600°F. BASE Next page POTS AND PANS MADE FOR DAILY DEMANDS 1 Body 2 Coating 3 Handle 4 Glass Lid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We really like these pans! Sturdy and cook well. I always hand wash, just to be sure not to ruin the finish. Cleaning is easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect egg pan!
reviews.reviewText: I use it primarily for cooking eggs and reheating small portions of other things to go along with my breakfast. Nothing sticks! Easy cleanup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a deal! They seem to be giving these pans away.
reviews.reviewText: These pans are A+ in my book. They are well made, the perfect size for everyday cooking, and healthy so you are not ingesting leached poisons into your foods. They have a nice weight and balance... and a good look about them. The ceramic-coated stainless steel is a hard combination to find. Most pans are aluminum coated with ceramic; a cheap combination. Now, these pans do have an aluminum core sealed with two stainless steel sides, top and bottom, for even heat distribution. That way no aluminum {a poisonous metal to humans) comes in contact with your food. So, they are safe to use. You can't go wrong buying this pan set... what a bargain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this in 22, the pan worked perfect. But know the bacon will stick to the pan. What am I doing wrong and please let me know how to cook. Even diced potatoes stick to the pan. Should I preheat the pan before putting food in or use a little oil

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nonstick lasted about 16 months when used several times per week incl. diswasher
reviews.reviewText: When this product worked, it worked very well. Excellent non-stick characteristics, very good heating. We used it almost every day, including being put in the dishwasher just about nightly. After sixteen months, the pan still looks great -- no distortions, no real scratches, lid still fits perfectly, nothing coming loose, no corrosion. However, when cooking and cleaning, the "non-stick" performance is becoming noticeably worse, to the point where we'll soon buy another, even though it won't be "bad" for another few months. Of the many skillets we've bought, this is "middle of the road" performance for this price point. (The longest-lasting ones were about 2 years, the shortest about 1 year). This price / performance is only marginally better in value compared to what you could find on sale -- but still worth paying extra for, especially if you value avoiding the hassle of frequent buying or are especially annoyed by problems like loose handles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super slick non-stick surface and nice size for small items
reviews.reviewText: This pan definitely lives up to the non-stick claims, and has the slickest surface I’ve had in a non-stick pan. Eggs slide right out, and anything I put into it makes its way onto my plate without a fuss. Cleanup is a wipe and a rinse, and the pan is light enough for anyone to manipulate it with ease.Highly recommend this pan to everyone with a need for top non-stick performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Everything sticks to it!
reviews.reviewText: Not non stick! Eggs, pancakes, sausage..all stick. And clean up is a nightmare. So disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this nonstick for induction stove
reviews.reviewText: I was so happy to find a nonstick pan that works on an induction stove!! This pan is great, mostly used for eggs and they slide right out. The instructions say to not use cooking spray, so I add a few drops of oil or small pat of butter to make sure nothing sticks. Super easy to clean, washing by hand is recommended.
